key_85:
Some Windows applications (like WhatsApp) may have custom proxy rules that do not route through Lantern proxies. This can be solved most easily by using the web version of the application, because Lantern proxies browser traffic by default. Another option is to reset any app-specific proxy rules:
1. Open Command Prompt or PowerShell (right click to “Run as administrator”)
